[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Input](./blockly.input_class.md) &gt; [appendField](./blockly.input_class.appendfield_1_method.md)

## Input.appendField() method

Add a field (or label from string), and all prefix and suffix fields, to the end of the input's field row.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
appendField<T>(field: string | Field<T>, opt_name?: string): Input;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string \| [Field](./blockly.field_class.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | Something to add as a field. |
|  opt\_name | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Language-neutral identifier which may used to find this field again. Should be unique to the host block. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Input](./blockly.input_class.md)

The input being append to (to allow chaining).
